title: Azure AI Storage
content:
Storage for Azure Ai Solutions 

Structured Data - Below services can help - 
Azure SQL DB
Azure PostgreSQL 
Azure maria db . 

Cosmos Db - High performance ,geo replicated multi NO SQL model db service with set of apis simiilar to other db services like   mongo ,document 
key-value , columnar store and graph dbs.  
When to chose ? 
1. If your data changes alot (millions transactions /sec)
2. Petabytes of data
3. Maintains the veracity of the data

unstructured -

Blob Storage Blob storage is a feature in Microsoft Azure that lets developers store unstructured data in Microsoft's cloud platform.
This data can be accessed from anywhere in the world and can include audio, video and text. 
Blobs are grouped into 'containers' that are tied to user accounts

Each blob can be accessed by a url which looks like http://mystorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net


Azure Data Lake (Gen 2) -Centralized transformed data used for tasks such as reporting, visualization, advanced analytics and machine learning .Each 
data lake has a file system underneath .

title: More topics to cover
content:
Processing in Azure AI Solutions

Azure AI Services and Models
 
Azure components and Servies

Automated Machine learning
